physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Multiple flat warts scattered on the whole body, prominently on the hands and legs.
Histopathology confirmed epidermodysplasia verruciformis with HPV types 5 and 8 positivity.
The patient with Hodgkin lymphoma had a large peritoneal mass confirmed by computed tomography.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Chemotherapy with ABVD resulted in dramatic resolution of intra-abdominal lymphadenopathies.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: T-cell analyses showed reduced percentage of CD3+ T cells expressing TCR-Vα24 and TCR-Vβ11 (<0.02%) compared to healthy controls (0.36% and 0.42%).
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: NK T cells were deficient in the peripheral blood of patients with ITK mutations.
